channel.title: Can anyone help?
channel.description: Ya I'm using Devolution Server and I made it false so that anyone with player rights 0 is not premium. But can I make like a code that says unless the player name is "Tom Smith" or something like that? I would really appreciate the help. :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2008, 06:19:56 am[/size][hr]No one ever replies to my topics come on people plz! :| I tried using search button and google it didn't help! Can you please say something..

item.title: Can anyone help?

item.description:

Ya I’m using Devolution Server and I made it false so that anyone with player rights 0 is not premium. But can I make like a code that says unless the player name is “Tom Smith” or something like that?
